meanings.def: a weapon that is sent through the air and that explodes when it hits the thing that it is aimed at
examples: strategic missiles deployed in sparsely populated desert areas

meanings.def: an object that is thrown at somebody to hurt them
examples: Missiles including stones and bottles were thrown at the police.
Another missile flew through the air.
They pelted her with eggs and various other missiles.
a crowd of youths armed with missiles that included petrol bombs
